products.title: Cordoba Blackout Purple Roller Blind
products.description: The deep purple tone here is one of warmth, its a stylish colour somewhere between dark blackcurrant and lighter grape, it has depth but isnt too vibrant or loud. This blackout roller blind will add a sophisticated note to a bedroom or maybe a cosy look in a bathroom.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Roller Blind
products.description: The tiffany flawless is an elegant and refined blind. A light, breezy fabric layered with a natural contoured pattern, the flawless looks simply stunning as it delicately shimmers in the light. Use the timeless off-white of the flawless to accentuate darker neutrals in a home office or dining room, or pair with pretty peaches and medium woods to add a touch of sophistication and class to an open kitchen diner.

products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Roller Blind
products.description: A blind offering a light and classy fabric, the tiffany smoulder is a modern take on the colour charcoal, with three gently contrasting tones and a beautiful pattern. The combination of natural-shaped patterning and the fine texture of the cloth allows this blind to flow effortlessly when lowered. The subtle variations in tone on this blind make the smoulder well-suited to both darker themed rooms, like traditional country cottage kitchens with dark wood features, and light and airy living rooms and dining rooms.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection is both an attractive and practical range of quality blinds, with flame-retardant fabric and a modern roller mechanism. Feature the pewter in either a domestic or commercial surrounding for a contemporary look with beneficial practical properties. Combine the pewter with a modern and distinctive monochrome scheme to form a contemporary look full of current and characteristic style.

products.title: Tiffany, Chrome - Roller Blind
products.description: An on-trend portfolio of natural greys and a free-flowing pattern combine harmoniously to create tiffany chrome. The way in which the threads shimmer under the light gives it the name, and the way in which it refines any contemporary space gives it the reputation. Match with deep sandy browns and hints of natural green for a simple triple colour offering that instantly makes you feel at home. For an added touch of inspiration you could add some simple minimalist wall art to the home office so that you can get truly creative when the time comes.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Roller Blind
products.description: Compose a sophisticated look with the roma (fr) in beige, where a soft and subtle fabric forms an elegant blind with a modern and practical edge. With flame-retardant, crease-free fabric, mounted on a simple rolling mechanism, this graceful blind brings soothing colour and understated style. Frame the beige with plush fabrics in complementing mocha or chocolate tones to form a window display that's full of contrast and alluring colour.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the cool and contemporary roma (fr) in grey within any surrounding for a modern looking blind with graceful finesse. This lenient and flame-retardant cloth forms an easy-to-use roller-blind with a simple pull-cord mechanism and in a charming, dove grey finish. Combine the grey with a distinctive and compelling palette of white, charcoal, and black shades to form a monochrome-influenced scheme that's full of alluring colour contrasts.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection features flame-retardant fabrics, which makes them perfect for either the family home or commercial site. The light grey edition is sure to blend within any dcor style for a contemporary look with subtle shade. Form an attractive and delicate palette, with an industrial edge, by incorporating the light grey with a soft blend of pastels in vintage pinks and creams. Accent the blind by adding subdued grey fabrics within the rest of the room, adding character and charm with dainty florals and paisley prints.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Showcase the brilliant and bright roma (fr) in crimson within a playful room to include stimulating colour and modern style. The contemporary roller mechanism and striking dye produces an eye-catching look in a dazzling and distinctive red shade. Complement the crimson with a fun and friendly collection of primary colours, forming a welcoming and plentiful colour scheme for a playroom. Encourage an imaginative and creative feel by blending blocks of contrasting colour with a stark white background for vivid bursts of colour.

products.title: Tiffany, Imagine - Roller Blind
products.description: Dare to imagine the ideal blend of natural beige, soothing creams, and a naturally flowing raised patterning, and you have the tiffany imagine, the calming influence you have been looking for. The imagine will work wonderfully amongst contrasting dark woods in a neutral living or sitting room, or in a luxurious bedroom full of browns, creams, and golds. Or place in a guest bedroom or hallway where the distinctive tiffany patterning can add a touch of neutral style with little effort.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: For an eye-catching window display, feature the vivid roma (fr) in azure. Made from sturdy, flame-retardant material, perfect for commercial use, this is a modern blind with a simple rolling mechanism for easy functionality. Blend the vibrant azure with bursts of lime green, dove grey, and duck egg blue to form a current palette of summer brights. Stick to a soothing white or ivory base for a clean and contemporary look, adding heaps of character and contrast by intertwining the selected tones with botanic prints and compelling textures.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna mist is a very modern take on a standard white blind. With a gentle hint of silver and the two-tone effect created by the raised deanna patterning, this blind offers a pretty and classy shimmer. The mist is the perfect addition to any contemporary room and will contrast well with crisp, clean colours and tones, setting off against rich greys particularly well. Use in a bedroom for a bright and airy feel, or in a bathroom to keep the atmosphere fresh and clean.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a gentle, off-white cream to provide a calming, discreet background colour, but want a little bit of character to go with it, then the softly patterned deanna in soft cream is the blind for you. Ideal for a hallway in which you want to control the light without darkening the room or clashing with your existing interior dcor, this blind will work well against browns and other neutrals.

products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever and enchanting blend of different tones of cream, the tiffany dove is a light, classy blind whose patterning provides a distinctive and eye-catching feature for any window in your home. Place in the bedroom to provide a light and airy feel, and a natural colour against other dcor, or perhaps add to the bathroom, where the dove will offer balance and airiness when set against bolder colours that need toning down.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, dark blue of the origin (blackout) in chambray is one of elegance and royalty, and can induce a moody or a regal feel depending on what it's paired with. Its sleek, cutting edge finish makes it a pleasure to use and means it will stand the test of time, just like its colour. Use in the bedroom alongside dark woods and gold trims for a regal, stately look, or pair with light and dark greys and off-whites in the dining room or home office for a contemporary but moody feel.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Coffee - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many households, so feature the popular origin (blackout) in coffee in your bedroom for some well-deserved rest. This simple addition will help to shield the room against the night-time light, whilst fitting in most window spaces perfectly, and adding some brilliance to your dcor. Merge the coffee with a rich and captivating combination of cream, caramel, and cocoa hues, creating a comforting space full of warming tones.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ebony - Roller Blind
products.description: Blinds don't get much more blackout than the darkest of dark shade of the origin (blackout) in ebony. This ultra-black blind has a sleek, quality finish to its fabric, and its well-made rolling mechanism make it long-lasting and simple to use. We all know that black goes with anything, but to really make the ebony pop, set it against reds and whites for a modern-chic style living room or dining room.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Roller Blind
products.description: Pretty in rosy pink, the origin (blackout)'s illusion is an attractive and appealing shade, combining all of the benefits of a blackout blind with a contemporary, pretty look. It's deceptively sturdy, enough so that it can handle plenty of day-to-day use. Nestle the illusion amongst whites, creams, and paler pinks to create a candy-coloured dream bedroom. Or go for something a little different by placing it in a bathroom; after all, who says bathrooms have to be aqua? We certainly don't.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Roller Blind
products.description: Is it blue or is it grey? Or perhaps it has a hint of mint green in it? The chameleon-like origin (blackout) riptide will get your guests talking, and whilst it's doing that will still be offering a sleek, robust window covering that blocks light easily. Nestle the riptide amongst aqua blues and turquoises to bring out the fresh iciness of this blind. It's the perfect hue for a green or blue bathroom, or would work well as a subtle accent colour in a light and airy white bedroom or hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Shield against the night-time light and bright, summertime sun with the origin (blackout) in crimson, a quality blackout blind that fits perfectly in any window size. This plush red shade is sure to brighten your home, whilst simultaneously adding a modern edge with its simple rolling mechanism. Form a romantic and attractive dcor by featuring the crimson amongst an assortment of dainty florals and delicate details.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Lime - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for an explosion of natural colour that you'll fall in love with the moment you see it, look no further than the free-flowing colour that is origin (blackout) in lime. The green seems to jump off the fabric and dart all over the place. Just what you want when you're trying to reinvent your use of space. We love the idea of using lime in the kitchen so that you can introduce some natural energy to the heart of the home.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, opaque cream of the origin (blackout) in oyster gives you the best of both worlds; all of the benefits of a high quality blackout blind, while still maintaining a light, window-like feel. The smooth, hardy fabric means it's also built to last, not just for show. Cream, of course, will match almost any colour scheme, but will look particularly good in a traditionally styled neutral living room, surrounded by browns and golds, or pitted against bolder colours in a bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid blue of the origin (blackout)'s sky is a sight to behold, being even more sky-blue than anything outside can offer. This bright tone will bring the outside in, even when it's blacking out the sun from outside. For a bold, playful look in a playroom or child's bedroom, match the sky with a colourful wallpaper full of greens, yellows, and oranges. Alternatively, add to a white or cream home office for a striking look and a clean, contemporary feel.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Steel - Roller Blind
products.description: The light, pastel shade of the origin (blackout) in steel adds a perfectly neutral accent to any window. Its cutting edge blackout properties mean that it will keep out even the brightest rays from the sun, yet you won't be compromising on style. The steel contrasts wonderfully with its sister browns and beiges, yet also tempers bolder colours such as burgundy or emerald when needed. Use to complement contemporary patterns in the kitchen or bold blues or greens in the bathroom.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to add a subtle stone grey to the mix that has a hint of urban chic, origin stone is the fabric that makes it possible. It's more than just a unique touch of style, and thanks to the blackout fabric it allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. The perfect marriage of style and functionality. Taking your time is the way to create spaces you love, so why not give your new project some extra thought? Lightly sanded floors, magnolia walls, and striking wall art to finish everything off.

products.title: Kerry Light Bark Roller Blind
products.description: The kerry light bark is a soft brown, but darker than a taupe colour. This fabric is a blackout meaning it is perfect for bedrooms as it will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Kerry Lime Roller Blind
products.description: The kerry lime is a strong, bold green colour that is one that won't go unnoticed in your window. Pair in with a neon theme to really make this blind pop. There isn't much else we can say about this colour other than how vibrant and green it is, it is a blackout fabric so would also work in a bedroom and prevent any light from passing through the fabric itself. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: The dark grey of the kerry charcoal is perfect for adding as darker and mysterious tone to your windows, or pairing in with a darker grey feature wall in your home. This is a blackout fabric so will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric. Use this in your bedroom if you're woken by the early morning sun or bright streetlamps outside your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Dark Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The kerry dark grey is probably the colour that would come to mind when someone says the words 'dark grey' to you. With this in mind, we do offer free samples of all their fabrics, but equally, if you're looking for a dark grey blind - this is probably it. Being blackout means this is perfect for your bedroom too as it will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Blush Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The light blush blue of this vertical blind is perfect for adding a lighter, bright colour to your windows. Pairing in beautifully with soft pastel or neutral tones, this fabric is also blackout so will stop all light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Kerry Light Hessian Roller Blind
products.description: The lighter beige colour of the kerry light hessian is perfect for installing in a neutral toned room, use this blind alongside similarly toned decors and let the blind shade your room from the sun, whilst also sitting back and taking it easy in your window. Also being a blackout fabric this blind is perfect for bedrooms as it will block all of the light from passing through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Emerald Roller Blind
products.description: The emerald green kerry fabric is a tealy-green fabric that is somewhere between tropical green, teal and emerald- this is a fabric to see as it's unique colouring. This is also a blackout fabric which makes it ideal for bedrooms as it'll block out all of the light passing through the blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Stoney Rock Roller Blind
products.description: The lighter grey colour of the kerry stoney rock is perfect for adding into a more neutral and toned down decor. This blind is great for pairing against lighter grey decors and for blending into the background. This blind is also perfect for bedrooms as the blackout fabric will block all of the light from passing through the material. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Pencil Lead Roller Blind
products.description: A rich grey that borders on black, the kerry pencil lead is one of those wonderful blinds that can fit into any styling within your home. We challenge you to find somewhere that this blind doesnt look right at home. With the slightest hint of brown beneath its dull silver tones it even matches well enough into beige and off-white palettes, the arch enemy of the grey blind. Completely blackout, this blind is perfect for bedrooms and any other space where you need to hide yourself from the world.

products.title: Kerry Daisy Roller Blind
products.description: Pure as freshly fallen snow, the creatively named kerry daisy is the perfect blind to choose if you want to add a crisp and clean accent to an interior space. Whether it is contrasting stark monochromatic schemes or sharpening a more colourful palette, the white will make itself right at home. Completely blackout, no amount of sunlight is too much for this flexible and timeless blind. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Azure Roller Blind
products.description: A beautiful shade of royal blue, the kerry azure is a great accessory to any room. Paired with whites, neutrals or grey it works as a bold statement of colour, whereas combined with other blues or even browns it creates a homely and comforting space. Combined with its blackout properties, you will be totally sheltered from curious eyes and direct sunlight. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Pearl River Roller Blind
products.description: This elegant pastel blind features a raincloud-grey tone with delicate silver undertones, for a feather-soft shade that lends itself to near enough any colour scheme. Created with 100% blackout fabric, it's an ideal choice for bedrooms and movie rooms, where the dense fabric ensures minimal light bleed in from outside. River pearl is of their bestselling rollers, and also available as a vertical.

products.title: Kerry Hot Pink Roller Blind
products.description: The aptly named kerry hot pink is about as subtle as yelling pink at the top of your voice. It will steal the show, no matter what room you put it in, from a neutral toned bedroom in desperate need of a bit of colour to a brashly painted playroom where no other blind will do. Completely blackout, it will keep you in comforting darkness on those days off when you are trying to enjoy that well earned lie in.

products.title: Kerry Boysenberry Roller Blind
products.description: This gorgeous purple is what you would imagine the king of the aubergines to be. Royal and dignified, but with a restraint that shows his benevolence, he is the most beloved of all the vegetable kings. All his magnificence is present in this blind, from the rich colour that diplomatically cooperates with a variety of palette and decor designs to the steadfast defense of his realm from harsh sunlight that fades sofas and melts ice cream.

products.title: Kerry Paradise Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Combining the colour of unblemished sapphires and the soft resilience of its polyester fabric, this blind is undeniably the greatest thing ever invented by man. No joke. Being such a rich colour with so much personality, that this blind will make your home better in every regard is a given. The only danger to ordering this blind is that houseguests may or may not try to steal it, but if they are willing to endanger your friendship for a window blind, then they arent worth it honey.

products.title: Kerry Raven Roller Blind
products.description: Like an english trained butler, this beautifully dark and reserved blind will quietly await instruction, blocking all light and eyes on demand. It is also very polite about it, co-operating with most colour palettes without complaint or sideways comment. Using it to round out a monochromatic scheme, creating a stark contrast with white walls and furnishings, is a great way of creating a timeless look in your home that doesnt take too many risks.

products.title: Kerry Bubblegum Roller Blind
products.description: As subtle as an elephant with a megaphone, the kerry bubblegum will add a certain panache to any room it occupies. Bright and cheerful, throw it in as a statement piece for a neutral or white space and we guarantee your guests will bring it up in conversation and they will love it. Completely blackout as well as stylish, no prying eyes or scorching sun will be able to penetrate into your safe place.

products.title: Kerry Midnight Silver Roller Blind
products.description: Cool as a cucumber, this sharp grey blackout blind is a fantastic way to add an edge to your interior styling. Throw it in with dark blues or rich reds and you will have a beautiful contrast that is not too jarring to the beholder. Alternatively, use it in a monochromatic scheme to bridge the contrast and make the room seem sleeker and more uniform. With a fully blackout lining, you wont even need to worry about the sun shining in and and being a jerk by waking you up.

products.title: Kerry Oxford Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Elegant, regal and just a little bit dangerous, like a tiger in a tuxedo, the kerry oxford blue is great at adding a block of solid block of rich yet understated character to your room. Paired with lighter neutrals or even stark whites, the versatility of this blind is second only to its raw charisma. Completely blackout, it adds a layer of extra functionality that makes it suitable for a number of environments, most notably the bedroom, where privacy and darkness are paramount.

products.title: Kerry Fresh Strawberry Roller Blind
products.description: The colour you see when you get cut off at an intersection, the gorgeous kerry fresh strawberry is a physical manifestation of that burning anger that just feels so damn good. Ideal for rooms rocking warm colours, like other reds, oranges and browns, you could also use it to heat up a cooler colour palette and add some fire to your life. Being blackout as well, it gives you total darkness and privacy as you smash lamps and write angry reviews of restaurants on yelp.

products.title: Kerry Moonshine Roller Blind
products.description: Creamy but malty, the kerry moonshine has a wonderfully mellow tone that has a certain rustic charm to it. Perfect for those rooms you want to make feel that little bit cosier, it can either be paired with earthier neutrals like browns or act as a foil to richer tones like dark reds or blues. Completely blackout, the moonshine will keep out all peeking eyes and harsh sunlight from your private space, making it perfect for media and bedrooms where you want to chill undisturbed and free from judgement.

products.title: Kerry Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: We love their neutral tones here, and there is no blind more neutral than the kerry cotton. The gorgeous and flawless cream tones are wonderfully flexible, complementing almost any scheme, whether it is full of brash blues and reds or more earthier browns and greens. Try throwing it in a room with wood furnishings or panelling and get a charming rustic flavour, or dont, im a website not your decorator.

products.title: Kerry Harmony Roller Blind
products.description: Like a thick gloop of cream on your scone, the excitingly named kerry harmony is a dollop of fresh, off-white tones that offer a beautiful accent to colourful spaces and delicious desserts. Alternatively, combining it with other natural and rustic tones like whites, browns or tans gives your room a much cosier and more mellow vibe. Fully blackout, this blind is perfect for bedrooms and living spaces where you need complete darkness and privacy.

products.title: Kerry Light Blush Roller Blind
products.description: Cheeky and whimsical, the kerry light blush adds a macho charisma to any space it occupies. With the colour and sweetness of cotton candy, you will find it fits snugly within a variety decor styles and palettes, anything from folksy creams and greys to brighter purples and reds which need a softer accent. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Kerry Muted Aqua Roller Blind
products.description: You cant go wrong with this gorgeous pastel blue that adds a soft dash of colour to any room without demanding too much attention. Perfect for spaces filled with white, grey or neutral colours that need a gentle accent, this blind will be right at home from the get go. With a thick blackout lining it keeps all the sun out too, making it perfect for bedrooms and other spaces that need their darkness and privacy.
